title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Design Thinking-Applied Online Science Education Course Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design elementary science education simulations by applying the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Learners can develop learner-centered science education content in VR environments and improve it by incorporating evaluation feedback.
Learners can prototype elementary science education scenarios through group collaboration (5+ members) and analyze experimental results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
